issue.title: [C++] index_in/is_in kernels missing support for timestamp with timezone
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13948](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13948). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The index_in and is_in kernels should support all equatable value types.  At the moment it supports all except for timestamp types that have a timezone.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13948?focusedCommentId=17441727) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11368
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11368>
